snippet: A court has ordered three wives and two adult daughters of Osama bin Laden to serve six weeks in prison for illegally entering the country, to be followed by their deportation.
abstract: Pakistani court orders three wives and two adult daughters of Osama bin Laden to serve six weeks in detention for illegally entering the country before being deported.
lead_paragraph: A court has ordered three wives and two adult daughters of Osama bin Laden to serve six weeks in prison for illegally entering the country, to be followed by their deportation.

headline.seo: Pakistan Orders Bin Laden Wives and 2 Daughters Deported
headline.main: Pakistan Court Orders Deportation of Bin Laden’s Wives
headline.print_headline: Pakistan To Deport Bin Laden’s Relatives
